rukus.text: 70|1|prashn kiya ek prashn karane[1] vaale ne us yaatana ke baare mein, jo aane vaalee hai.
70|2|kaafiron par. nahin hai jise koee door karane vaala.
70|3|allaah oonchaeeyon vaale kee or se.
70|4|chadhate hain farishte tatha roohî€¼[1] jisakee or, ek din mein, jisaka maap pachaas hazaar varsh hai.
70|5|atah, (he nabee!) aap sahan[1] karen achchhe prakaar se.
70|6|ve samajhate hain use door.
70|7|aur ham dekh rahe hain use sameep.
70|8|jis din ho jaayega aakaash pighalee huee dhaatu ke samaan.
70|9|tatha ho jaayenge parvat, rangaarang dhune hue oon ke samaan.
70|10|aur nahin poochhega koee mitr kisee mitr ko.
70|11|(jabaki) ve unhen dikhaaye jaayenge. kaamana karega paapee ki dand ke roop mein de de, us din kee yaatana ke, apane putron ko.
70|12|tatha apanee patnee aur apane bhaee ko.
70|13|tatha apane sameepavartee parivaar ko, jo use sharan deta tha.
70|14|aur jo dharatee mein hai, sabhee[1] ko, phir vah use yaatana se bacha le.
70|15|kadaapi (aisa) nahin (hoga).
70|16|vah agni kee jvaala hogee.
70|17|khaal udhedane vaalee.
70|18|vah pukaaregee use, jisane peechha dikhaaya[1] tatha munh phera.
70|19|tatha (dhan) ekatr kiya, phir saunt kar rakha.
70|20|vaastav mein, manushy atyant kachche dil ka paida kiya gaya hai.
70|21|jab use pahunchata hai duhkh, to udvign ho jaata hai.
70|22|aur jab use dhan milata hai, to kanjoosee karane lagata hai.
70|23|parantu, jo namaazee hain.
70|24|jo anapee namaaz ka sada paalan[1] karate hain.
70|25|aur jinake dhanon mein nishchit bhaag hai, yaachak (maangane vaala) tatha vanchit[1] ka.
70|26|tatha jo saty maanate hain pratikaar (pralay) ke din ko.
70|27|tatha jo apane paalanahaar kee yaatana se darate hain.
70|28|vaastav mein, aapake paalanahaar kee yaatana nirbhay rahane yogy nahin hai.
70|29|tatha jo apane guptaangon kee raksha karane vaale hain.
70|30|sivaay apanee patniyon aur apane svaamitv mein aaye daasiyon[1] ke, to vahee nindit nahin hain.
70|31|aur jo chaahe isake atirikt, to vahee seema ka ullanghan karane vaale hain.
70|32|aur jo apanee amaanaton tatha apane vachan ka paalan karate hain.
70|33|aur jo apane saakshyon (gavaahiyon) par sthit rahane vaale hain.
70|34|tatha jo apanee namaazon kee raksha karate hain.
70|35|vahee svargon mein sammaanit honge.
